attributes.action: Give the British public a general election now.
attributes.additional_details: The public never voted for Liz Truss and the public never voted for Rishi Sunak and mandates aren't being kept when Boris Johnson was voted for.
attributes.background: Give the British public their voice on who they want, to run their country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
